briefTitle: Clinical, Histological and In-depth Molecular Characterization as Well as Experimental Models of Liver Metastasis From Patients With Breast Cancer in Order to Identify New Potential Treatment Avenues.
officialTitle: Clinical, Histopathological, Molecular and Experimental Characterization of Liver Metastases From Patients With Breast Cancer.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To characterize the tumour cells and their microenvironment in the liver metastases at the transcriptomic and protein single-cell level.
